mapper.sql: prdt_no, device_code, prdt_dtl_info, sort_seq, rgster_no, rgst_dtm, moder_no, mod_dtm
mapper.update:
/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.product.repository.master.PdProductDetailDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE PD_PRODUCT_DETAIL
prdt_no = #{prdtNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_code = #{deviceCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prdt_dtl_info = #{prdtDtlInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort_seq = #{sortSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER},
rgster_no = #{rgsterNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgst_dtm = #{rgstDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
moder_no = #{moderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mod_dtm = #{modDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE device_code = #{deviceCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND prdt_no = #{prdtNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
